item.title: basty for Behavioral Analysis of Sleep in *Drosophila melanogaster*
item.description: Quantifying animal behavior is the main objective of the field of computational ethology, and is not an straightforward task. From a purely computational point of view, the task can be seem as mapping spatiotemporal features (e.g., changes and postures) to behavioral categories.
